column5: Does anyone know when the big girls start to hit in the bay this fall?
http://www.fishingbayofquinte.com/forum/activity.php?http://forum2.quintefishing.com/index.php Can't help Ron but maybe you can monitor these websites. Good luck. FT
Ron, try fishawk forum. There's lots of info if you just search "quinte". The giants are caught in November and December, trolling, before ice up in some of the narrows leading into the bay.
Take a look at http://www.bayofquintecharters.com/. Their Home page provides information on when and where the "big girls" come in from Lake Ontario.
And Scott is the man! He lives on the lake, he is on the water everyday so he knows where to find those big mama's. You can fish in any weather on his boat.
